help.title: JJk Support
help.description: If you need support, we're always here to help. It's as easy as joining [JJk support server](${guildInvite}).

lang.title: Do you want to change the bot's language?
lang.description: Select any language from the list below.
lang.rights: Not enough rights, you must be the owner of the server.
lang.changed: Done, the bot language has been changed to **${langValue}**.
